grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 奚琴【ケイキン】xiqin (2-stringed Chinese musical instrument)
携琴【ケイキン】sihu (4-stringed Chinese musical instrument played with a bow)
和琴【ワゴン】wagon, yamatogoto, six-stringed native Japanese zither
kun reading compounds: 琴【こと】koto (13-stringed Japanese zither), stringed instrument, zheng (Chinese zither), guzheng
琵琶の琴【びわのこと】biwa (4 or 5-stringed Oriental lute)
